txt.en: Klúso is waiting for your report.

'You probably noticed that Shakhajât is full of all kinds of hobgoblin weapons! They are surely of poor quality, but while we're here we should destroy as many of them as we can! Even a dull blade can do some damage, after all, and we have dwarves to protect!\n\n'It's a good thing we've got some extra bombs. They'll do the trick, no problem!'
'Fine work, [placeholder]! This will surely set the hobgoblins back! It will take weeks for them to replace all those weapons.'
'Fine work, [placeholder]! This will surely set the hobgoblins back! It will take weeks for them to replace all those weapons.'

'You probably noticed that Shakhajât is full of all kinds of hobgoblin weapons! They are surely of poor quality, but while we're here we should destroy as many of them as we can! Even a dull blade can do some damage, after all, and we have dwarves to protect!\n\n'It's a good thing we've got some extra bombs. They'll do the trick, no problem!'
Hobgoblin weapons can be found throughout Shakhajât, and should be destroyed.
Shakhajât is full of hobgoblin weapons, and Klúso believes this is a good opportunity to destroy them.
